name: Odd Skunk Out
description:
In Zoocity, the city is going through its roughest time yet. Animals aren't enjoying their days as they used to and unfortunately, bad Skunks have been causing too many problems for the Animal kingdom.

A case of bad timing and unfortunate events have made "Skunky" travel into the city to continue his studies.

Although his arrival isn't very welcomed at the time, he hopes by helping the people around, he can add some color to the greyness in the air.
